ACT
203
Delivery of the will and declaration. Submission of the will to the court
A person who possesses a document that he can assume is the will of a deceased person is obliged to hand it over to the nearest municipal court without delay.
A person who knows that the testator made a will and where it is located is obliged to inform the municipal court about it.
The probate court is obliged to request without delay all information from the Croatian register of wills about the possible wills of the deceased person, and from the person and body to whom the will was entrusted for safekeeping to provide it.
